apptext.oneLastStep: RÉVISEZ VOTRE FOURCHETTE DE PRIX AFIN DE PRÉCISER VOS RÉSULTATS
apptext.changeYourAnswer: Cliquez sur une icône pour modifier votre réponse

text.question: What can we help you find?
Quel produit aimeriez-vous explorer en premier?
Avez-vous des restrictions quant à la taille?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la taille?
text.explanation: Nos fours encastrés sont offerts en différentes tailles; nous voulons nous assurer de recommander celui qui convient parfaitement à votre espace.

text.question: Quel style de four encastré recherchez-vous?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de l’orientation?
text.explanation: Nous offrons différents modèles de fours. En comprenant vos préférences, nous sommes en mesure de trouver le duo parfait pour votre foyer.

text.question: Lorsque vous magasinez un four encastré, qu’est-ce qui est le plus important pour vous?
text.sub_question: Faîtes glisser pour reclasser les caractéristiques : 1 correspond à la plus importante et 5 à la moins importante
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de mes préférences?
text.explanation: En comprenant vos priorités en matière de cuisson, nous pouvons mieux déterminer les caractéristiques qui conviennent à votre style de vie.

answers.text: de l’espace pour faire cuire de grands plats
une chaleur uniforme pour une cuisson de précision
des caractéristiques permettant de faire cuire des repas à plusieurs services

text.question: Comment votre famille vous décrirait-elle?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la cuisine?
text.explanation: Nos fours sont tous dotés de caractéristiques uniques. Nous voulons nous faire une meilleure idée de l’utilisation que vous en faites afin de pouvoir recommander celui qui convient parfaitement à vos besoins en matière de cuisson.

answers.text: un boulanger-pâtissier – gâteaux et tartes; je suis habituellement couvert de farine
un chef maison – j’adore essayer de nouvelles recettes
je suis passé maître dans l’art de préparer des petits gâteaux et des lasagnes
ni un ni l’autre – notre famille s’intéresse plus aux mets à emporter

text.question: Dans quelle mesure l’économie d’énergie est-elle importante pour votre ménage?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de l’énergie?
text.explanation: Tous nos appareils sont différents, tout comme les familles à qui ils sont destinés. Si nous pouvons comprendre votre consommation d’énergie, nous pouvons alors mieux recommander le four encastré qui est parfaitement adapté à vos besoins.

text.question: Lorsque vous magasinez une cuisinière, quelles caractéristiques vous importent le plus?
text.sub_question: Faites glisser pour reclasser par ordre d’omportance, 1 étant  la caractéristique la plus importante et 5 à la moins importante
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de mes préférences?
text.explanation: En comprenant vos priorités en matière de cuisson, nous pouvons mieux déterminer les caractéristiques qui conviennent à votre style de vie.

text.question: Quel est le plus gros plat que vous faites cuire régulièrement?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la capacité?
text.explanation: Si vous préparez souvent de grands repas, nous vous recommanderions alors un four d’une plus grande capacité.

scale: Casarole and shepherd’s pie for Sunday dinner

1.text: gratin et pâté chinois pour le souper du dimanche

2.text: un festin pour la soirée de jeux

text.question: Pourquoi cuisinez-vous?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la cuisine?
text.explanation: Toutes nos cuisinières sont dotées de caractéristiques uniques. Nous voulons nous faire une meilleure idée de l’utilisation que vous faites de votre cuisinière afin de pouvoir recommander celle qui convient parfaitement à votre style de vie.

answers.text: j’adore cuisiner pour d’autres personnes et recevoir des invités
je cuisine pour ma famille pour montrer que je l’aime
pour moi-même, parce que c’est ma passion
je cuisine par nécessité, surtout des repas

text.question: Comment votre famille vous décrirait-elle?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la cuisine?
text.explanation: Nos cuisinières sont toutes dotées de caractéristiques uniques. Nous voulons nous faire une meilleure idée de l’utilisation que vous en faites afin de pouvoir recommander celle qui convient parfaitement à vos besoins.

answers.text: un boulanger-pâtissier – gâteaux  et tartes; je suis habituellement couvert de farine
un chef maison j’adore essayer de nouvelles recettes
les deux – je suis passé maître dans l’art de préparer des petits gâteaux et des lasagnes
ni un ni l’autre – notre famille s’intéresse plus aux mets à emporter

text.question: Votre cuisine est-elle équipée pour une alimentation au gaz ou électrique?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de l’alimentation au gaz?
text.explanation: Certaines cuisines sont équipées pour l’alimentation au gaz, d’autres non. Nous avons besoin de connaître cette information pour recommander la cuisinière parfaite.

text.question: Quel style de cuisine préférez-vous?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet du style?
text.explanation: Saviez-vous que les cuisines professionnelles comportent habituellement des cuisinières à commandes frontales? Une fois que nous comprenons vos préférences en matière de style, nous pouvons recommander la table de cuisson parfaite pour vous.

text.question: How many people do you care for in your household?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my family size?
text.explanation: Much like your family, all of our machines are unique. If we understand a little more about your family we can recommend a machine that suits the specific needs of your home.

text.question: How important is energy efficency to your household?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines are different, understanding your energy use will help us find the machine that best fits the needs of your home.

text.question: Do you often find yourself doing laundry in a rush?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about timing?
text.explanation: Some of our laundry machines are specifically designed to get you out the door in record time. By understanding your needs we can find the machine that best suits your lifestyle.

answers.text: Yes, we are always on the go
Only when there is an unexpected spill

text.question: When doing laundry, is noise a concern?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about sound?
text.explanation: Some of our laundry pairs are specifically designed to limit noise. By understanding your needs we can find the perfect machines for your home.

answers.text: Very - our laundry is located near a bedroom
Moderately - our laundry room is located near our main living area
Somewhat - noise doesn't bother me for the most part
Not at all - my laundry is in the basement

text.question: What’s your laundry pair preference?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about orientation?
text.explanation: We know that every laundry space is different. by understanding what orientation you prefer, we’re better able to find you the perfect pair.

text.question: What kind of fabrics do you wash together?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fabrics?
text.explanation: Everyone does laundry differently. By understanding how you separate your fabrics, we will be better able to suggest cycle options that fit your specific lifestyle needs.

text.question: Do you frequently adjust the drying cycle time?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about time?
text.explanation: We would like to save you time by offering you cycles that will minimize your need to continually check your laundry progress.

text.question: Do you often worry about the wear and tear doing laundry might have on your clothes?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about wear?
text.explanation: Some of our machines are designed to minimize wrinkles. By helping us determine your needs, we are better able to provide for them.

text.question: Do you frequently refresh your clothes by putting them in the dryer?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about refreshing my clothes?
text.explanation: Did you know that some of our dryers are equipped with steam technology? This feature cares for garments by adding freshness without drying them out or the need for a full wash.

text.question: Is your laundry room equipped for a gas or electric dryer?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fuel type?
text.explanation: Some laundry rooms are fitted for gas dryers. Selecting your preference will help us filter the search results and provide the option best suited for your home.

text.question: We've got the perfect fridge for your family.
text.question_more: Just tell us how much space you have to fill.
text.sub_question: Faites glisser et cliquez pour répondre
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la taille?
text.explanation: Our fridges come in mAny sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: How important is energy efficency to your household?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our fridges are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect fridge to fit your needs.

text.question: On a regular basis, my fridge feeds...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
text.explanation: We want to get a better idea of how you use your fridge and what you put in it so we can find you the one that fits your lifestyle.

answers.text: Myself, to keep me fueled all week
Me and my better half, we enjoy taking care of each other
My family, from lasagna night to Sunday roasts, we’re a hungry bunch
My large family, the cooking never ends but we have leftovers for packed lunches
Our guests, I love family bbqs

text.question: My fridge...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
text.explanation: Our fridges are carefully designed from the inside out. By better learning what you put in your fridge, it will help us recommend the right one for your lifestyle.

answers.text: Keeps the drinks cold – from milk to fruit juice and everything in between
Stores our party eats, from team celebrations and birthday bashes

text.question: Does your kitchen have an existing waterline?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about a waterline?
text.explanation: Did you know that your kitchen needs a water line in order for your fridge to dispense water? Some of our models provide water-dispensing features. By understanding how you consume water, we can recommend a fridge that will best suit your needs.

answers.text: Yes - it's great because we love water and ice dispensed from our fridge
No - but we would consider installing one so out fridge could dispense water and ice
No - we don't have a waterline and would prefer not to install one

text.question: For the most part, your family’s fridge is...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
text.explanation: Did you know that the orientation of the fridge affects how you organize your food? By better understanding how you use your fridge, we can recommend your perfect match.

text.question: I want my fridge to look like this...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Did you know that some of our fridges are designed to be in-line with your counters? To better recommend the perfect fridge for your needs, we need to understand your preferences.

answers.text: Counter depth fridge – I want my fridge to be in-line with my counters
Standard depth – I don’t care if my fridge is in line with my counters

text.question: How do you shop for groceries?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about groceries?
text.explanation: Our fridges are designed with unique features. By understanding how you shop, we learn more about how you use your fridge and can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

answers.text: I’m on a first-name basis at the farmers’ market
I visit the grocery store but stick to the perimeter to get the basics
I go aisle-to-aisle at the grocery store and always fill my cart
I stock up on staples from the frozen food aisle

text.question: If we looked in your dishwasher right now we would probably find...
text.explanation_title: why are you asking me about what i wash?
text.explanation: Knowing what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to recommend options that ensure all your dishes sparkle and shine.

text.question: How many times a week does your family run the dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
text.explanation: When it comes to washing dishes there is no job too big or too small. By understanding what goes into your dishwasher we can find the perfect fit for your home.

text.question: When do you usually run your dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about start time?
text.explanation: Our dishwashers have different sound profiles. By understanding your start time we can determine which machine is best for your busy family.

answers.text: Before we leave for work and school

text.question: Do you live in an open concept space?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my space?
text.explanation: If you live in an open concept space, we want to take that into consideration to recommend the perfect machine to keep the noise at a minimum.

answers.text: Yes - My kitchen opens onto another room
No - My kitchen is its own room

text.question: How important is energy efficency to your household?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines use energy differently. By understanding your energy use, it will help us find the machine that best fits your lifestyle.

text.question: Before running your dishwasher, it is...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
text.explanation: Everyone washes kitchenware differently. By understanding what goes into your dishwasher, we can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

text.question: Select your style...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: By telling us about your personal style, you're helping us find the machine that looks best in your home

text.question: My cooktop needs to be...
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la taille?
text.explanation: Not all cooktops are the same size.  By measuring your space we can provide you with a perfect fit for your home.

text.question: How would you describe your kitchen's aesthetic?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Did you know that professional kitchens usually have front control cooktops? Once we understand your style preference, we can recommend your perfect cooktop.

text.question: When shopping for a cooktop, what features are most important to you?
text.sub_question: Faites glisser pour reclasser par ordre d’omportance, 1 étant  la caractéristique la plus importante et 5 à la moins importante
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about these features?
text.explanation: By understanding what matters most, we can help you choose the best cooktop for your needs.

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fuel type?
text.explanation: By letting us know what works in your kitchen, you're helping us make the best recommendation.

text.question: What is the width of your cooktop or range?
text.explanation_title: Pourquoi me posez-vous une question au sujet de la taille?
text.explanation: Every kitchen is different. We want to make sure that your vent matches the size of your cooktop.

text.question: Where in your kitchen can we find your cooking surface?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about location?
text.explanation: Every kitchen is different. We need to get a better idea of where your cooking surface is in order to find the vent best suited for your space.

text.question: Do you cook with high heat often?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about temperature?
text.explanation: If you like to turn up the heat, we will have to find you a stronger fan.

text.question: Are there cabinets above your cooking surface?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my cabinets?
text.explanation: We know that every kitchen is different. If we know where your current cabinets are, we can recommend the perfect vent for your space.

text.question: Does your ventilation lead to your home's exterior?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about ventilation?
text.explanation: Proper ventilation is an important part of keeping the air in your home clean. If we know more about how yours works we can choose the best fit.

text.question: Do you find yourself limited by counter space?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about counter space?
text.explanation: Much like your ingredients work together to create the perfect meal, some of our vent models come together to save you space. By understanding your needs we can help you find the perfect fit.
